dcterms:creator: Baihan Lin
Xinxin Zhang
dcterms:description: MiniVox is an automatic framework to transform any speaker-annotated dataset into continuous speech datastream with episodically revealed label feedbacks. It generates infinite configurations of continuous multi-speaker speech streams.
dcterms:title: MiniVox

dcterms:creator: A. Nagrani
J. S. Chung
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: VoxCeleb is a large-scale speaker identification dataset containing thousands of speaker utterances recorded in various challenging multi-speaker acoustic environments.
dcterms:title: VoxCeleb

dcterms:creator: A Canavan
D Graff
G Zipperlen
dcterms:description: CALLHOME American English is a dataset containing a limited number of utterances recorded under controlled conditions, primarily used for speaker recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: CALLHOME American English

dcterms:creator: Alvin Martin
Mark Przybocki
dcterms:description: NIST RT-03 English CTS is a dataset used for speaker recognition evaluation, containing a limited number of utterances recorded under controlled conditions.
dcterms:title: NIST RT-03 English CTS

dcterms:creator: Mitchell McLaren
Luciana Ferrer
Diego Castan
Aaron Lawson
dcterms:description: Speakers in the Wild (SITW) is a speaker recognition database containing thousands of speaker utterances recorded in various challenging multi-speaker acoustic environments.
dcterms:title: Speakers in the Wild (SITW)
